Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
EnableUploadSizeLimit_Description: If true, upload file size limit is set
UploadSizeLimitMb_Description: Upload file size limit value, in Mbytes
UserSpaceLimitMb_Description: Default filestorage disk space quota for new user accounts created
TenantSpaceLimitMb_Description: With multitenancy enabled, default tenant space quota; with multitenancy disabled, total disk space quota for the installation
